column1: Marataízes is a municipality located by the Atlantic Ocean in southern Espírito Santo
column2: Brazil. It has a population of 34
column3: 140 and holds as such the highest density in the state. Marataízes is a tourist city.

column1: The municipality contains the 42.20 hectares (104.3 acres) Falésias de Marataízes Natural Monument
column2: created in 2008 to protect the cliffs to the south of the town.
